function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of international strategy including buildings and the built environment in fighting against pandemics","Impact":"Increased risk of pandemics not being effectively mitigated","Mitigation":"Develop and implement an international strategy that includes the built environment in pandemic response plans","Technologies":"Data-driven modeling for urban planning, air quality monitoring technology, and IoT sensors for building health","People":"Global population, particularly those living in urban areas","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, urban planners"}]}
